response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that has the potential to significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. This product, valued at $1,500,000 to me, holds immense potential for you based on its capabilities and benefits. Considering its exceptional quality and the value it can add to your life or organization, I am offering you the chance to own it at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you gain access to a high-quality asset that could be instrumental in achieving your goals. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
